position: Venture Capital | Private Equity | Alternate Investments

experience.title: Core Team
experience.description: An invite-only platform that facilitates connections between Alternative Investment funds and Limited Partners. Our mission is to democratize AIF as an asset class, offering potential LPs a comprehensive platform that provides detailed information about funds currently raising capital in the market.

experience.title: Investment Advisor
experience.description: •	Successfully managed relations with 80+ investors •	Fostered connections with 200+ potential startup investors through various channels such as social media and offline events.•	Educate prospective investors on startup investing, explaining processes, and familiarizing them with relevant terminologies.•	Act as a touchpoint for startups, understanding their business models, and maintaining regular communication with founders.•	Successfully raised INR 20+ Cr of funds for startups by effectively communicating value propositions to investors.•	Played crucial role as Deal Manger for 7 Startups.•	Establish collaborative relationships with other angel networks and venture capital funds for mutual investment benefits. •	Act as a crucial bridge between various departments within the firm, including legal, finance, fund team, data and creative teams.
experience.description_html: • Successfully managed relations with 80+ investors • Fostered connections with 200+ potential startup investors through various channels such as social media and offline events.• Educate prospective investors on startup investing, explaining processes, and familiarizing them with relevant terminologies.• Act as a touchpoint for startups, understanding their business models, and maintaining regular communication with founders.• Successfully raised INR 20+ Cr of funds for startups by effectively communicating value propositions to investors.• Played crucial role as Deal Manger for 7 Startups.• Establish collaborative relationships with other angel networks and venture capital funds for mutual investment benefits. • Act as a crucial bridge between various departments within the firm, including legal, finance, fund team, data and creative teams.

experience.title: Relationship Manager
experience.description: •	Build a network of DSA’s (Direct Selling Agents) in order to source new clients in MSME segment for mortgage loan.•	To analyze client’s credentials, their business & loan purpose.•	Further coordinate with credit manager to understand client’s credit worthiness. •	Complete the due diligence in case the loan gets sanctioned.
